roleset.name: to temporarily sell (personal property),
roleset.note: PAWN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pawn' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pawn.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pawn-v
example.text: But quick turnover in artwork is `` like [*] pawning your jewelry -- you end up with 50 % .

example.name: pawn-n
example.text: A situation escalates when a customer accuses the shop of paying him $100 less for a pawn of his camera and PlayStation 3.
